name: Wreck 'em!
description:
Description:

Defend the loot from all those unwanted cars and send them to where the came from... literally

Your job here is to destroy and take away of the road as many cars as possible!
Prevent them from stealing the loot in the middle... and do it fast because they will be coming faster and faster!

You do so by crashing into them... what could go wrong?

How high can you score?
Will you be able to upgrade your car to its limits

Controls:
- Left mouse click to move!
- P to pause!
